page.title: 05A Day In The Life...cont.
page.content: My Mum is not much taller than me but has blond hair which is long and curly and she is a Health Visitor. My dad is 36 and has short dark hair and is about 1m 81cm tall and he is a Policeman. I go and clean my teeth and wash, then I put on my coat and go to school. When I arrive I see my best friend Martin Cottington. After an uneventful play we have an Assembly and go back to class where we do Maths. Then it is break and after that we do Creative Writng. We then have lunch at 12.15p.m then break again which ends at 1.15p.m then we would do topic work. At 2.30p.m. we do P.E. and then go home. After I have got home I watch television or go out to play in the garden; then I have dinner and go to bed. That is a typical Friday.
